messages.content: Last time the pressure of a jail sentence pushed T.I. to create a diamond of an album. This time around? The cracks are showing.
Is Lloyd Banks a solo superstar, or a beneficiary of G-Unit's power? Let's see if The Hunger for More 2 has any answers...

Having honed his skills through years on the independent grind, as well as behind-the-scenes work with such heavyweights as Usher, 24-year-old singer/songwriter Miguel has stepped into the solo spotlight with his Jive Records debut, All I Want Is You. On the highly-anticipated set, the Los Angeles native introduces listeners to his unique, âeclectricâ take on modern R&B, drawing from sources as diverse as Prince, R. Kelly, Pharrell Williams, Babyface and Lenny Kravitz to craft a familiar yet progressive style all his own. Featuring the Salaam Remi-produced title track and lead single, an understated ballad which finds Miguel joined by Roc Nation phenom J. Cole, the project is available now at record stores everywhere.
Jive Records has teamed up with the DJBooth to give one lucky winner a brand new iPad loaded with Miguel's debut album "All I Want Is You". Enter now!
First single from "Lasers". MUST have! Shouts to #TheBuilding
